package ruletemplate.simple; import uk.gov.iebr.batch.model.input.Person ;
rule "Categorize Persons_2" no-loop true when $c: Person(removabilityScore >= 7, removabilityScore <= 100, removabilityCategory == Person.RemovabilityCategory.NA) then modify ($c){ setRemovabilityCategory(Person.RemovabilityCategory.GREEN)}; end
rule "Categorize Persons_1" no-loop true when $c: Person(removabilityScore >= 5, removabilityScore <= 6, removabilityCategory == Person.RemovabilityCategory.NA) then modify ($c){ setRemovabilityCategory(Person.RemovabilityCategory.AMBER)}; end
rule "Categorize Persons_0" no-loop true when $c: Person(removabilityScore >= 0, removabilityScore <= 4, removabilityCategory == Person.RemovabilityCategory.NA) then modify ($c){ setRemovabilityCategory(Person.RemovabilityCategory.RED)}; end
